info.name: Edit API
info.description: A collection of JSON video and image edit templates for the Shotstack API.

item.name: Audio

request.description:
Merge/stitch two audio clips together to create a single track.

[Example MP3](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/ecac713c-fc16-4cab-87b5-be4559e106d4.mp3)

<!--
{
  "url": "https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/ecac713c-fc16-4cab-87b5-be4559e106d4.mp3",
  "description": "Merge/stitch two audio clips together to create a single track.",
  "type": "audio",
  "thumbnail": "https://shotstack.io/assets/img/learn/articles/aws-polly-thumb.jpg",
  "poster": "",
  "permalink": "audio-stitch-2-tracks"
}
-->

Cut and stitch an audio track back together again. Can be used to chop out sections of audio or adjust volume at different time intervals.

[Example MP3](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/15d50513-2dfc-476d-934f-397072721e14.mp3)

<!--
{
  "url": "https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/15d50513-2dfc-476d-934f-397072721e14.mp3",
  "description": "Cut and stitch an audio track back together again. Can be used to chop out sections of audio or adjust volume at different time intervals.",
  "type": "audio",
  "thumbnail": "https://shotstack.io/assets/img/learn/articles/aws-polly-thumb.jpg",
  "poster": "",
  "permalink": "audio-seamless-stitch"
}
-->

Adjust the volume of an audio track at multiple points along the timeline. The track is cut in to multiple sections, each with a different volume.

[Example MP3](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/1e4ee349-2052-4240-a0f9-e370f1630ce5.mp4)

<!--
{
  "url": "https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/1e4ee349-2052-4240-a0f9-e370f1630ce5.mp4",
  "description": "Adjust the volume of an audio track at multpile points along the timeline. The track is cut in to multiple sections, each with a different volume.",
  "type": "audio",
  "thumbnail": "https://shotstack.io/assets/img/learn/articles/aws-polly-thumb.jpg",
  "poster": "",
  "permalink": "audio-multiple-volumes"
}
-->

item.description: Audio editing and manipulation templates.

item.name: Dissolves

request.description:
Dissolve (fade) between multiple video clips in a sequence.

![Dissolve fade example](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/6c3fc7d7-504d-47b7-927e-fb18e1a9db18.gif)

[Example MP4](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/44cbb5cb-7e3f-41e4-ba35-12a401b4753e.mp4)

<!--
{
  "url": "https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/44cbb5cb-7e3f-41e4-ba35-12a401b4753e.mp4",
  "description": "Dissolve (fade) between multiple video clips in a sequence.",
  "type": "video",
  "thumbnail": "https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/44cbb5cb-7e3f-41e4-ba35-12a401b4753e-thumb.jpg",
  "poster": "https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/44cbb5cb-7e3f-41e4-ba35-12a401b4753e-poster.jpg",
  "permalink": "dissolve-fade-video-clips"
}
-->

Dissolve (fade) between multiple video clips in a sequence. Slow fade plays over 2 seconds.

![Dissolve fade example](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/f1869853-2b10-4cf1-961c-f427b10e79f2.gif)

[Example MP4](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/18d6bc6b-e8e2-4b58-9403-e989bc64d5e3.mp4)

<!--
{
  "url": "https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/18d6bc6b-e8e2-4b58-9403-e989bc64d5e3.mp4",
  "description": "Dissolve (fade) between multiple video clips in a sequence. Slow fade plays over 2 seconds.",
  "type": "video",
  "thumbnail": "https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/44cbb5cb-7e3f-41e4-ba35-12a401b4753e-thumb.jpg",
  "poster": "https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/44cbb5cb-7e3f-41e4-ba35-12a401b4753e-poster.jpg",
  "permalink": "dissolve-fade-video-clips-slow"
}
-->

Dissolve (fade) between multiple video clips in a sequence. Fast fade plays over 0.5 seconds.

![Dissolve fade example](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/cd5ded7b-aa2a-42ae-a549-ba0373f312b4.gif)

[Example MP4](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/dafdc1a2-c173-443c-bd6a-ece853f3eb29.mp4)

<!--
{
  "url": "https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/dafdc1a2-c173-443c-bd6a-ece853f3eb29.mp4",

  "thumbnail": "https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/44cbb5cb-7e3f-41e4-ba35-12a401b4753e-thumb.jpg",
  "poster": "https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/44cbb5cb-7e3f-41e4-ba35-12a401b4753e-poster.jpg",
  "permalink": "dissolve-fade-video-clips-fast"
}
-->

Dissolve (fade) to and from black between a sequence of video clips.

![Dissolve fade example](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/46a639f2-3306-49c1-8ddd-146797b5462b.gif)

item.name: Filters

request.description:

Boost filter increases saturation and contrast.

![Boost filter example](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/b7073eed-db9b-4b11-b2e7-680c8376e143.gif)

[Example MP4](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/ed7b84b0-b104-4e83-84bd-ed826e214d0b.mp4)

}
-->

Contrast filter increases contrast.

![Contrast filter example](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/1c83804f-de16-49b8-a7a6-26d9526c5c53.gif)

[Example MP4](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/7dfc996a-378d-4361-9224-89bd4e6a84b2.mp4)

<!--
{
  "url": "https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/7dfc996a-378d-4361-9224-89bd4e6a84b2.mp4",
  "description": "Contrast filter increases contrast.",
  "type": "video",
  "thumbnail": "https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/7dfc996a-378d-4361-9224-89bd4e6a84b2-thumb.jpg",
  "poster": "https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/7dfc996a-378d-4361-9224-89bd4e6a84b2-poster.jpg",
  "permalink": "contrast-filter"
}
-->

Darken filter makes the clip appear darker.

![Darken filter example](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/ce952a84-cfe9-409d-a109-75774a85fe67.gif)

[Example MP4](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/9b669f58-fdf5-4088-b5e3-329105f941c3.mp4)

<!--

}
-->

Greyscale filter removes all saturation from a clip to create a black and white video.

![Greyscale filter example](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/17d59363-f53b-407e-81a1-56122bd39e5e.gif)

[Example MP4](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/1264e6b3-6509-4ac3-bc5c-4ea2afed5baf.mp4)

item.name: Processing

request.description:
Changes the framerate of a video to 25 frames per second (fps). Works best with source footage that is 25fps or a multiple of 25fps, i.e. 50fps. Frames are either removed or duplicated so the output length stays the same. The source footage in this example is 50fps.

![25fps video example](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/8a5eceeb-a0f0-438e-8fac-dd93e43d77ca.gif)

[Example MP4](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/38f6ed27-7311-4e7a-9888-5ca11e55fcad.mp4)

}

item.name: Quality

request.description:
The low quality parameter allows you to reduce the size of your video and improve render speeds at a small reduction in quality.

![Low quality video example](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/ff7001c1-66a4-4223-b66f-87309fd9f9f6.gif)

[Example MP4](https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/fe728d81-bf20-4694-9ad6-a5ff162e4505.mp4)

<!--
{
  "url": "https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/fe728d81-bf20-4694-9ad6-a5ff162e4505.mp4",
  "description": "The low quality parameter allows you to reduce the size of your video and improve render speeds at a small reduction in quality.",
  "type": "video",

  "permalink": "low-quality"
}
-->

The medium quality parameter is the default quality parameter used. It provides an optimal balance between quality, file size and render speed for most situations.

![Medium quality video example](https://shotstack-api-v1-output.s3-ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/msgtwx8iw6/e8c02bfd-6c8a-4788-96d0-b1dfec4d62b9.gif)

<!--

  "url": "https://cdn.shotstack.io/au/v1/msgtwx8iw6/b424de8f-173e-400d-9680-2b0a551d4213.mp4",

}
-->

The high quality parameter creates a video with higher visual quality but larger file size, slower download speeds and higher bandwidth costs.

![Highquality video example](https://shotstack-api-v1-output.s3-ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/msgtwx8iw6/52362db7-884a-4b24-9bea-ff875f7da42e.gif)
